ChouxiangRelic:tanlan.NAME: Greedy Gold
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain 9999 Gold when picked up. Can only spend once per shop.

ChouxiangRelic:chuncui.NAME: Pure Strength
ChouxiangRelic:chuncui.FLAVOR: Wouldn't it be nice if there was a card that both blocks and deals damage...
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain 50 Strength and 50 Dexterity at battle start. Can play at most 1 card per turn.

ChouxiangRelic:dengyideng.NAME: Wait a Second
DESCRIPTIONS: Wait 5 minutes in normal battles; 15 minutes in elite battles; 30 minutes in boss battles; 60 minutes in final battles to eliminate all enemies.

ChouxiangRelic:kuangwang.NAME: Arrogant Flame
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain Red Key when picked up. All subsequent campfires become elites with fire. Randomly strike a card and restore 20% HP after defeating elites.

ChouxiangRelic:weixianbaoxiang.NAME: Dangerous Chest
ChouxiangRelic:weixianbaoxiang.FLAVOR: You really love chests, don't you?
DESCRIPTIONS: All normal enemies become chest rooms. All question marks become elites with fire.

ChouxiangRelic:liliangdaijia.NAME: liliangdaijia
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain 15 Strength, Dexterity, and Focus at battle start. Cannot shuffle your deck.

ChouxiangRelic:dangao.NAME: Delicious Cake
ChouxiangRelic:dangao.FLAVOR: So delicious you never want to eat anything else.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain 150 Max HP when picked up. Cannot restore health anymore.

ChouxiangRelic:gangtiehexin.NAME: Iron Core
DESCRIPTIONS: Halve block gained from cards and gain equal Metallization. Convert attack damage dealt into half Thorns.

ChouxiangRelic:aoman.NAME: Proof of Arrogance
ChouxiangRelic:aoman.FLAVOR: A pile of relics is better than one... right?
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain all original boss relics when picked up. NL Do not obtain via loadout or you will be unable to move. Use console.

ChouxiangRelic:chenghuacheng.NAME: Ashes to Ashes
ChouxiangRelic:chenghuacheng.FLAVOR: What do I play when my deck is gone?
DESCRIPTIONS: Convert all cards in your #ydeck#! to 0 cost, #yEthereal#, #yExhaust# when picked up. (Does not affect copy cards)
